verses.name: Esther 2:17
verses.text: And the king loved Esther above all the women, and she obtained grace and favour in his sight more than all the virgins; so that he set the royal crown upon her head, and made her queen instead of Vashti.

verses.name: Esther 2:18
verses.text: Then the king made a great feast unto all his princes and his servants, even Esther’s feast; and he made a release to the provinces, and gave gifts, according to the state of the king.

verses.name: Esther 2:19
verses.text: And when the virgins were gathered together the second time, then Mordecai sat in the king’s gate.
